roleset.name: to badmouth, malign
roleset.note: TRADUCE-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from traduce.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: This is the U.N. group that [*T*-26]-1 managed [*-1]to traduce its own charter of promoting education , science and culture .
example.arg: its own charter of promoting education , science and culture
